posts.post_content:
@dingophone  
Black has a long, proud tradition of reanimating things cheaply and with no life payments. [Exhume](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Exhume), [Animate Dead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Animate Dead), [Necromancy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Necromancy), [Zombify](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zombify), [Rise From the Grave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rise From the Grave), [Reassembling Skeleton](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reassembling Skeleton), [Bloodghast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bloodghast), [Necrosavant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Necrosavant), [Dance of the Dead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dance of the Dead), [Stitch Together](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stitch Together), [Hell's Caretaker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hell's Caretaker), [Shallow Grave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shallow Grave), [Doomed Necromancer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doomed Necromancer), [Diabolic Servitude](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diabolic Servitude), [Recurring Nightmare](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Recurring Nightmare), and others I'm certain I'm forgetting. This is a perfectly appropriate effect for black.
posts.html:
@dingophone
Black has a long, proud tradition of reanimating things cheaply and with no life payments. Exhume, Animate Dead, Necromancy, Zombify, Rise From the Grave, Reassembling Skeleton, Bloodghast, Necrosavant, Dance of the Dead, Stitch Together, Hell's Caretaker, Shallow Grave, Doomed Necromancer, Diabolic Servitude, Recurring Nightmare, and others I'm certain I'm forgetting. This is a perfectly appropriate effect for black.

posts.post_content:
FINALLY! No more of this 'Regenerate' B.S. Ever since I saw [Drudge Skeletons](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Drudge Skeletons), I have been waiting for a simple Zombie that I can play straight out of the graveyard. I don't think he's too powerful, especially since you still have to pay mana for him.  
  
Regenerate is for starfish and trolls, not Zombies. not really. Zombies don't regenerate their limbs at all. Whatever's left of them just kind of keeps crawling at you. This card is perfect and needs to be reprinted in a Core Set at least once.  
  
One thing though: I would like it to have more bony art, since I prefer skeletal zombies to the kind that look like they are from modern horror movies. Just my opinion. However, of all the zombies with 'normal clothers', this one is my favorite and I would be satisfied just to see it reprinted. I guess the fans of 'zombies with clothes' also should get at least one card that is more obviously not a skeleton, since Wizards designs cards for more than one type of person to enjo... Regenerate is for starfish and trolls, not Zombies. not really. Zombies don't regenerate their limbs at all. Whatever's left of them just kind of keeps crawling at you. This card is perfect and needs to be reprinted in a Core Set at least once.
